function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survey data collection lacking identifying information","Impact":"Limited ability to trace, contact, or identify respondents in case of disease outbreak","Mitigation":"Include voluntary contact information for tracing purposes","Technologies":"Survey platforms with optional contact fields","People":"Survey respondents and public health officials","Owner":"Survey administrators and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Broad promotion of the survey","Impact":"Increased risk of reaching a wider, potentially unrepresentative sample","Mitigation":"Target specific demographic groups and use multiple dissemination channels","Technologies":"Targeted social media advertising, demographic filters, and community outreach","People":"Survey administrators and data analysts","Owner":"Survey organizers and data analysis team"},{"Description":"Encouraging the use of private channels for survey participation","Impact":"Potential loss of data integrity and inability to verify the authenticity of responses","Mitigation":"Emphasize the importance of truthful and accurate responses","Technologies":"Data validation techniques and quality control measures","People":"Survey respondents and data analysts","Owner":"Survey administrators"}]}
